description: This requirement is for an improved galley that will replace and modernize the current galley counters, storage, refrigerator, juice dispensers and cooking equipment within the existing galley footprint in all four of Royal Canadian Navy's (RCN) Victoria-Class Submarines (VCS).
full_summary:
=====================================

**Improved Galley for Victoria-Class Submarines (VCS)**
------------------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:**  cb-5035-26596980

**Solicitation Number:** W8472-235880/A

**Request for Proposal**
-------------------------

The Department of National Defense is inviting tenders for the procurement of an improved galley for the Royal Canadian Navy's (RCN) Victoria-Class Submarines (VCS). The proposed contract is for the replacement and modernization of the existing galley counters, storage, refrigerator, juice dispensers, and cooking equipment within the existing galley footprint on all four VCS submarines.

**Key Contract Details**
-------------------------

*   **GFN Contract:** 422-1726161
*   **Estimated Contract Value:** $ISPC million
*   **Contract Term:** 1 December 2023 to 28 February 2025
*   **Number of Submarines:** 4
*   **Location:** Canada

**Proposal Evaluation Criteria**
-------------------------------

The proposal evaluation process will be based on the lowest cost-per-point criterion.

**Trade Agreements**
------------------

*   This contracting opportunity is subject to the following trade agreements:
    *   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
    *   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
    *   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement

**Attachments**
-------------

Attachments to this tender notice include the following documents:

*   W8472-235880 - Improved Galley - TBEP Annex H (English)
*   W8472-235880 - Annex B (TSOR and Appendix 1-9) - English
*   W8472-235880 - Amendment 002 (English-French)
*   W8472-235880 - Amendment 003 (English-French)

**Tender Details**
-----------------

*   **Publication Date:** 26 April 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** The proposals must be received by 2:00 PM EDT on 10 July 2023.
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** 02 October
